titleStmt.title: Of Thomas Morley the first booke of balletts to fiue voyces
Balletts
titleStmt.author: Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603?
Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The authorship of the words has been attributed to Michael Drayton.
Five partbooks, each with separate dated title page and collation. At head of title, part 1, "Cantus."; part 2, "Altus."; part 3, "Tenor."; part 4, "Bassus."; part 5, "Quintus.".
The roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
Signatures: [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-D⁴ E² ; [A]² B-D⁴ E² .
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
